text: Muiris Ó Begléighinn, Irish physician, died 1528. The Annals of Connacht, sub anno 1528, record his obit. Muiris son of Donnchad O Begleighinn, an eminent physician, died, with Unction and Penance. The Annals of Loch Cé for the same year records Muiris, son of Donnchadh Ó Beigléighinn, an adept in medicine, who died this year. The surname is now generally rendered as Beglan or Beglin. ==See also== * Ó Begléighinn ==References== * http://www.irishtimes.com/ancestor/surname/index.cfm?fuseaction=Go.&UserID;= * http://www.ucc.ie/celt/published/T100011/index.html Category:16th-century Irish medical doctors Category:People from County Longford Category:1528 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Muiris Ó Begléighinn
